page.title: 06Brightwalton Manor Farm
page.content: This is a{mixed}farm.The main{crops are{wheat,barley,maize and oil seed {rape.}The farmer has many{implements _ {2 ploughs,2 seed drills,2 sets of {harrows,2 sets of discs,2 fertilizer {spreaders,2 sprayers,2 balers,2 hay {turners,2 bale handlers,2 ordinary {trailers,2 livestock trailers,1 {dispensing trailer,3 corn trailers,1 {lorry,1 rape swather,2 forklift {trucks,3 John Deere tractors,2 Ford {tractors,1 Mercedes Benz tractor,2 {John Deere combines,4 light and 4 {heavy cultivators,1 muck spreader,1 {slurry tanker,1 grass mower,1 hedge {trimmer,1 brush cutter and 1 bale {accumulator. Livestock}includes{pigs {Charolais beef cattle, Friesian dairy {cows, pheasants and chickens.}The farmer employs four men.
